alert.note: Alert for Van Buren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 8:26PM CDT until May 06 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR VAN BUREN COUNTY... At 826 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Leando, or 8 miles northwest of Keosauqua, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Lebanon around 830 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Birmingham, Kilbourn, Lacey Keosauqua State Park, Lake Sugema Campground, Keosauqua, Mount Zion, Van Buren County Fairgrounds, Keosauqua Airport, Bonaparte, Stockport, Bentonsport/Vernon and Utica. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
